thread.title: Quaid taken into custody in Vermont trying to cross border - KEPR CBS 19
thread.title_full: Quaid taken into custody in Vermont trying to cross border - KEPR CBS 19 - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KEPR CBS 19
title: Quaid taken into custody in Vermont trying to cross border - KEPR CBS 19
text:
American actor Randy Quaid was taken into custody Friday night while trying to cross into the United States from Canada, Vermont State Police said. The "Independence Day" actor was detained by troopers at the Highgate Springs port of entry days after Canadian officials said he would be deported.
 KEPR CBS 19.
